duties_responsibilities.duty: Read telemetry strips and relay information to medical professionals efficiently.
Float to other Telemetry units as needed.
Remain calm during stressful situations and maintain high level of patient care.
Treat patients with dignity and respect.
Start ASAP and maintain excellent standard of care.

education_certification.credential: Valid New Jersey or Compact State Registered Nurse License
Two (2) years strong Telemetry experience preferred, NIH Certification preferred
